Trade/Device Name(s): PRODIGY iConnect Blood Glucose Monitoring System
PRODIGY No Coding Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PRODIGY iConnect Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of blood glucose using an electrochemical biosensor with mobile device connectivity
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, upper arm, palm, calf, or thigh for self-testing at home by people with diabetes, as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
